name: Island of Survival
description:
Fight your way to survival while stuck on a floating island filled with monsters. Try to stay alive as long as possible. 

 The controls are wasd keys or arrow keys to move, right click to shoot, and left click to sword attack.

To open on windows after expanding zip file: 

Island_of_Survival_windows>Island of survival.exe

To open on mac after expanding zip file: 

Contents>MacOS>Island of survival
